div.class: col-lg-8 col-xl-9 bg-grey px-lg-4 px-xl-5 content

p.class: file-title-sidebar font-weight-bold mt-3 mt-md-0 ml-0 ml-md-1

a.class: btn btn-primary btn-lg rounded-pill mb-3 mx-1 mx-md-2 mt-1

button.class: btn btn-outline-primary btn-lg rounded-pill mb-3 mt-1 btn-share

div.class: col-lg-4 col-xl-3 px-lg-4 px-xl-5 sidebar active d-block

div.h3: You’re getting this file from all over the world.
div.p: Storj Decentralized Cloud Storage splits files into smaller pieces, then distributes those pieces over a global network of Nodes and recompiles them securely on download. This map shows the real-time locations of this file’s pieces.
80 Storj nodes are storing a piece of this file

div.class: col-12 col-lg-12 text-center map mt-4 mb-5

div.p: Just copy and paste the link to share this file.

div.class: d-flex col-12 px-lg-4 px-xl-5 align-items-center justify-content-between footer

div.p: Sign up for Storj DCS now and get 25 GB of free storage.

a.class: btn btn-primary btn-lg rounded-pill d-block d-md-inline-block
btn btn-outline-primary btn-lg rounded-pill ml-5 px-4
